column2: ??Set coding standards and help drive the strategic technical direction of our WordPress development efforts.  ??Gather business requirements and design technical solutions to meet those needs.  ??Build fully functional WordPress websites based on business requirements and design specs.  ??Understand and modify existing systems as business requirements change.  ??Develop system test criteria and participate in systems testing.  ??Respond to, isolate and resolve programming problems.  ??Required Experience & Knowledge  ??Web Technologies: HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript, JQuery  ??Server Side Technologies: PHP, all others a plus.  ??Data Formatting Technologies: XML, XSL, JSON  ??Web/ Application Servers: Apache, Tomcat, Microsoft IIS, WAMP, NGINX  ??,150517500310.0,2018-12-26,2019-03-26,EducationalOccupationalCredential,36.0,Engineering - Software & QA,Back End Developer,IT Services & Consulting,server
